column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. zajalun li’abī mudīn al-ghawth
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣad. qaṣīdah. basīṭun li’abī al-ṭīb al-nafzī

column2: yā ṭl‘t al-badr lā annah basharun
ammā hawāk falā yubqī walā yadar

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. birūālatin. raṣad. malḥūnun lisayyidī muḥammad al-ḥarrāq
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. qaṣīdah. sarī‘un lizubaydah zawjat al-rashīd
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil

column2: fās yā raw‘at al-shādī w maghnamah
qālū aḥabubt fās w nshghlt bihā

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. mazmūm. shoghl. tawshīḥ mjzū’ al-khufayf li‘ubid al-raḥman al-fāsī
